content: a luxuriously soft baby blanket knit with chunky merino yarn for instant gratification inspired by the classic pattern grandma s favorite dishcloth level beginning knitting sizes 30 x 30 materials + notions 4 x 100 gram ball love fest fibers twin merino sample shown in colors glacier lilac gray shoreline and lavender needle size 15 10 mm in 24 length tapestry needle gauge 2 st/inch in garter stitch blocked
